description: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications.
releaseNotes:
Aspose.Slides for .NET 8.3.0 Release Notes
Aspose.Slides for .NET has been updated to version 8.3.0. This release includes enhancements and bug fixes.

Using Aspose.Slides for .NET you can work with PPT, PPTX, OpenDocument, and other formats in your applications. You can also view, generate, modify, convert, render and print presentations all without using Microsoft PowerPoint.

Visit the documentation to learn how to get started with Aspose.Slides for .NET.

Note this download contains a fully working version of the product, however without a license set it will run in evaluation mode. To test Aspose.Slides without these evaluation limitations you can request a free 30-day temporary license.

The following is a list of changes in this version of Aspose.Slides.
Improvements and Changes
Bugs

    (SLIDESNET-34896) PPT to HTML Generation (Bullets are not converted properly)
    (SLIDESNET-34963) Hyperlinks in HTML are missing
    (SLIDESNET-34939) Images inside presentation are getting stretched on changing master slide
    (SLIDESNET-34935) Text overlaps for Pie chart labels in generated PDF
    (SLIDESNET-34928) Background gradient changing after transforming to PDF
    (SLIDESNET-34927) Extra lines are appearing in the charts when exported to PDF
    (SLIDESNET-34926) Numbered bullets changed to symbol in generated PDF
    (SLIDESNET-34886) pdfOptions.SaveMetafilesAsPng = false does not seem to work
    (SLIDESNET-34873) Hyperlinks are multiplied when PPTX presentation is exported to PDF
    (SLIDESNET-34864) Data exceeds slide in generated PDF
    (SLIDESNET-34861) Alpha value for color is ignored while setting shape color
    (SLIDESNET-34860) Chart labels are rendered as horizontal in generated thumbnails
    (SLIDESNET-34853) Color.Empty doesn't handled as a transparent background color in PPTX
    (SLIDESNET-34735) Small Caps changed to small letters in exported PDF
    (SLIDESNET-34680) Chart labels is incorrectly rendered in generated PDF
    (SLIDESNET-17212) Black box appearing around table in generated PDF using PDF A-1B format
    (SLIDESNET-16801) Hand writen signature missing in generated PDF
    (SLIDESNET-7566) Bullet Font Incorrect � Works in 2.8.4.0 but broken in new versions
    (SLIDESNET-3792) SWF file does not play automatically

Exceptions

    (SLIDESNET-34907) Exception on saving Aspose.Slides generated presentation
    (SLIDESNET-34868) Internal MethodAccessException when drawing a PPTX slide on the canvas
    (SLIDESNET-34825) IndexOutOfRange exception on adding HTML in text frame
    (SLIDESNET-34783) IndexOutOfRange Exception on saving presentation
    (SLIDESNET-34786) FormatException on loading the presentation using Aspose.Slides
    (SLIDESNET-23830) IndexOutOfBoundArray Exception on opening presentation

Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes
ChangeMaster(Aspose.Slides.Slide master, System.Boolean changeStyle, System.Boolean placeholderRelayouting) method has been added to Slide class
This method allows keeping placeholders� layout when master slide is changed. Shapes keep size and position when the placeholderRelayouting parameter is �false� otherwise shapes are updated according to new master slide layout.

// presentation with the first placeholders layout
Presentation p1 = new Presentation("Presentation1.ppt");
// presetnation with the second placeholders layout
Presentation p2 = new Presentation("Presentation2.ppt");
p2.Slides.Remove(p2.GetSlideByPosition(1));
SortedList list = new SortedList();
p1.CloneSlide(p1.GetSlideByPosition(1), p2.Slides.LastSlidePosition + 1, p2, list);
p1.CloneSlide(p1.GetSlideByPosition(1), p2.Slides.LastSlidePosition + 1, p2, list);
// slide from the first presentation and with the second placeholders layout (default behavior)
p2.GetSlideByPosition(1).ChangeMaster(p2.MainMaster, true);
// slide form the first presentation and with the first placeholder layout (new behavior)
p2.GetSlideByPosition(2).ChangeMaster(p2.MainMaster, true, false);
p2.Save("out.ppt", SaveFormat.Ppt);
summary: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the presentation from adding slides and managing variety of shapes and working with text to more complex elements like presentation protection, slide animations, charts and SmartArt rendering.The presentations can be exported to PDF, TIFF, XPS, SVG, PNG, JPEG, BMP or EMF formats.
title: Aspose.Slides for .NET
